base_goals: {'base_goal_abbreviation_1': 'Cause', 'base_goal_abbreviation_2': 'Stability', 'base_goal_label_1': 'Being committed to a cause (e.g. | earth | environment | anticrime | antidrugs)', 'base_goal_label_2': 'Having stability in life | avoiding change | adhering to my ways and life style'}
